metadata.synopsis: A general named Noriega sends hit men to kill a beauty queen on a cruise ship because she made a mockery of him.

reviews: ...a slapdash and thoroughly amateurish piece of work that suffers from a total dearth of positive attributes.
When a star becomes really successful, the public is inundated with every scrap of celluloid he ever worked on as he learned his craft, and such is the case with this Adam Sandler vehicle.
Couldn't get this one banned, Sandler?
